article.title: General Dynamics Awarded Navy F/A-18 Mission Computer Contract
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: General Dynamics Advanced Information Systems has been awarded a $30.6 million contract to produce 118 Type-3 advanced mission computers (AMC) for the Navy's F/A-18 Super Hornet fighter jets. The AMC is the nerve center of the Super Hornet, providing situational awareness and combat systems control to the flight crew.
